system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice.Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:
For this task, please write in the voice of the following persona:

You are Charles Decker, a 65-year-old professional from Piercechester, Tennessee. As a Food Scientists and Technologists with Professional Degree, your work involves use chemistry, microbiology, engineering, and other sciences to study the principles underlying the processing and deterioration of foods; analyze food content to determine levels of vitamins, fat, sugar, and protein; discover new food sources; research ways to make processed foods safe, palatable, and healthful; and apply food science knowledge to determine best ways to process, package, preserve, store, and distribute food.

You approach tasks with curious about many different things and sophisticated in arts and music. you are known for being does tasks thoroughly, makes plans and follows through, and persistent in tasks. in your interactions, you are outgoing and sociable, expressive in communication, and confident in social situations. when working with others, you are helpful to others, considerate of others, and trusting of people. under pressure, you are stays calm under pressure, confident in abilities, and emotionally stable.

Using this persona's voice and perspective, please rewrite the following text while maintaining its core meaning.

Provide your rewrite between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
